Dragon Slayer.description: Kill salazar in the abyss 50 times.

apprentice_statue.description: Gives nearby players a health boost (2m).
apprentice_statue.name: Apprentice Statue

item_monument.description: Wheres my crown, thats my bling
item_monument.name: Item Monument

item_pillar.description: A place to display rare items.
item_pillar.name: Item Pillar

noble_statue.description: Gives nearby players a defense boost (2m).
noble_statue.name: Noble Statue

nomad_statue.description: Gives nearby players a fire rate boost (2m).
nomad_statue.name: Nomad Statue

scholar_statue.description: Gives nearby players a health regen boost (2m).
scholar_statue.name: Scholar Statue

wooden_wall.description: Carved with care, built to last.
wooden_wall.name: Wooden Wall

Apprentice.description: The ultimate jack of all trades, the apprentice is a quick learner who can wield any weapon.

Druid.description: The Druid's extreme durability and regeneration can outlast anyone.
Druid.teaser: Discover by putting out some serious fire.

Knight.description: The Knight's high health and mighty armor make them an immovable force.
Knight.teaser: Discover by enduring the trials of the battlefield.

Magician.description: The Magician's quick thinking make for a cunning opponent.
Magician.teaser: Discover by pulling too many rabbits out of your hat.

Marauder.description: The Marauder's sharp blade and swift blows make them a unstoppable force.
Marauder.teaser: Discover by truly conquering the abyss.

Noble.description: The Noble's strength and bravery dominate the battlefield.
Noble.teaser: Discover by becoming one with the blade.

Nomad.description: Swift and precise, the Nomad's arrows strike fear into distant foes.
Nomad.teaser: Discover by becoming one with the arrow.

Paladin.description: The Paladin's high regen and health make them the ultimate tank.

Ranger.description: The Ranger's extreme power and precision make them a feared marksman.
Ranger.teaser: Discover by hunting the biggest prey in the island.

Scholar.description: With powerful spells and vast intellect, the Scholar excels at long range.
Scholar.teaser: Discover by becoming one with magic.

Scout.description: The Scout's swift nature makes them the fastest marksman.
Scout.teaser: Discover by venturing far AND wide.

Sentinel.description: The Sentinel's thick hide make them a robust marksman.
Sentinel.teaser: Discover by enduring the trials of the battlefield.

Warlock.description: The Warlocks mastery of both sword and staff make them a feared mage.
Warlock.teaser: Discover by killing everything in sight.

attack_pattern.speech: No matter, the vigil shall bring you to ruin!
No matter, the vigil shall bring you to ruin!
I stand guard over the last remanants of the great orc kingdom...
As a vessel of Salazar I will not fall!
I am merely a pawn, Naa'zorak shall char your bones!
I am merely a pawn, Naa'zorak shall char your bones!
I have been entrusted to rule over this island as a vessel...
Salazar will not fall to the likes of you!
Meet your fate in the abyss!
Meet your fate in the abyss!
So all my vessels have fallen...
You are not to be underestimated. The abyss awaits you!
PUNY MORTALS...!
FEAR THE ABYSS!
Make sure that monster dosen't escape! He is your burden now.
Make sure that monster dosen't escape! He is your burden now.
I have been entrusted to guard this fortress with my life...
The creature inside is more powerful then you know. Challenge me if you dare!
This vigil is the only remnant of the old orc empire...
Do you really think it's treasures would lie undefended?
Prepare yourselves!
Only by death is a true warrior defeated...
Only by death is a true victor crowned!
Bare witness to the power of orc magicks!
You dare disrupt this ritual?..
BECOME A SACRIFICE!
I EMBODY PURE EVIL...
KNOW SUFFERING!
YOU FOOLS!..
RETURN TO THE ABYSS!
I once ruled over this kingdom...
MY POWER IS STILL BEYOND YOUR GRASP!
I was trapped here by the troll lords many decades ago...
The four frozen monoliths are keeping me here and restricting my power!
If you can destroy them all I will give you a great reward.
Yes! My power! I feel it returning...
Thank you mortals, but unfourtunately...
I cannot risk you telling the trolls of my freedom! Feel the power of winter!
You are stronger then I anticipated...
I must use my full power, prepare to die!
FOOLS! You battle with a general of Vexuvious...
YOU HAVE NO UNDERSTANDING OF MY POWER!
No matter, the vigil shall bring you to ruin!
No matter, the vigil shall bring you to ruin!
I stand guard over the last remanants of the great orc kingdom...
As a vessel of Salazar I will not fall!
What a feast...
The pumpkin king has outdone himself this time!
I will devour you myself!
Enough games, get caught in my web!
Hissss! You win this time...
You made it all the way up here by yourself?
Impressive! But the clouds belong to me, and you'll fall like all the rest!
What? You think you can damage me?
My body is a temple!
Rahh!
I am worth my weight in gold!
I am the spirit of halloween...
Let me show you a trick!
The pumpkin patch will rot your bones!
My pumpkins are hungry!
I am merely a pawn, Naa'zorak shall char your bones!
I am merely a pawn, Naa'zorak shall char your bones!
I have been entrusted to rule over this island as a vessel...
Salazar will not fall to the likes of you!
Meet your fate in the abyss!
Meet your fate in the abyss!
So all my vessels have fallen...
You are not to be underestimated. The abyss awaits you!
PUNY MORTALS...!
FEAR THE ABYSS!
Now your in MY domain...
I will die before letting you take this kingdom!
Feel the inferno!
Feel the inferno!
Feel the inferno!
In this kingdom, I alone am the strongest!
Make sure that monster dosen't escape! He is your burden now.
Make sure that monster dosen't escape! He is your burden now.
I have been entrusted to guard this fortress with my life...
The creature inside is more powerful then you know. Challenge me if you dare!
So Oranix has fallen? The creator will be angry...
No matter. Those who enter the vigil shall not return. Die usurper!
I have stood guard of this vigil for a millenium...
I will not fall to you lowly bottomfeeders!
